mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Martha Washington to Frances Bassett Washington, 1784 August 7
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Although not alone, she has missed her since she left--General goes over the mountains next month--expects brother [Bartholomew Dandridge] up and will go down to see him in Sept.--Mrs. [David] Stuart improving--her stays arrived from Annapolis--paid Mrs. Charles Stuart who paid mantua maker--Miss Ramsay married--Nelly well--Tubs [G.W.P. Custis] never unhappy about absent friends--letter from her [Fanny's] pappa, didn't mention Fanny. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, laminated, with integral address panel.
